channel.title: CVE Feed for PowerDNS -- Recursor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PowerDNS -- Recursor

item.title: CVE-2024-25583|2024-04-25T09:45:05.220Z -- PowerDNS -- Recursor
item.description: A crafted response from an upstream server the recursor has been configured to forward-recurse to can cause a Denial of Service in the Recursor. The default configuration of the Recursor does not use recursive forwarding and is not affected.
